headline.main: RUSSIANS REPORT GERMANS IN TULA; Small Armored Force Is Said to Have Entered Part of City 110 Miles From Moscow

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Sunday Nov. 2 -- While a midnight communique from Moscow referred to operations yesterday in the routine phrase that "stubborn resistance continued all day along the entire front," a Soviet military commentator was heard this morning to say the situation had been serious yesterday in the Maloyaroslavets sector and, though now in hand, could be considered still very menacing.
abstract: USSR repts Tula in state of siege; severe counter-attacks continue; Kalinin fight continues; battle rages, Crimea; USSR sends new reserves, Rostov and Moscow areas; USSR Air Force reptd to have destroyed many tanks and guns, Moscow area
